title: Northwest Cloud Pillow Travel to Go, One Size, Multi Color
features: This Ultra comfortable Cloud Design is the perfect throw pillow for watching the game at home or at the game.
15 in Diameter stitched with your favorite team's logo
Great for traveling with it's compact, and plush sizing.
description: After resting your head on this Officially Licensed NCAA Travel Cloud Pillow by The Northwest Company, you will never look at travel pillows the same! This 15” travel cloud pillow is extremely soft and super stretchy; you won’t be able to put it down! This cloud pillow features your favorite college team’s logo on the front with 4” depth to the back, in a round shape. This pillow is so comfy, that when you lay down, you will fall fast asleep dreaming as if you’re floating on a cloud. This amazing cushiony pillow is the first of its kind and you will never find anything like it. 94% Polyester & 6% Spandex. Spot clean only.
